suggest.amasty/rewards-mftf-2: Install rewards-mftf-2 module to be able to run Reward Points MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version
suggest.amasty/rewards-mftf-3: Install rewards-mftf-3 module to be able to run Reward Points MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
suggest.amasty/rewards-graph-ql: Install rewards-graph-ql module to be able to use Reward Points GraphQL queries.
